name: Habibi Whitsundays 2 Day 1 Night Sailing Tour
description: Embark on an exhilarating 2-day sailing adventure aboard Habibi, a charming 18-meter steel ketch known for its comfortable and stylish design. Ideal for adventure seekers and nature lovers, this tour offers a perfect blend of relaxation and excitement. Experience the pristine beauty of the Whitsunday Islands as you sail past tropical islands, snorkel in the Great Barrier Reef Marine Park, and explore the iconic Whitehaven Beach. With a lively and professional crew ensuring non-stop fun, this tour promises unforgettable memories under the sun and stars.
includes:
2 days sailing aboard Habibi
Visit to Whitehaven Beach and Hill Inlet Lookout
Snorkeling at 2-3 pristine reef locations
All meals prepared fresh onboard
Snorkeling gear
Experienced and entertaining crew
highlights:
Sail past tropical islands with stunning corals and clear turquoise waters
Explore Whitehaven Beach and visit Hill Inlet Lookout
Snorkel around the islands in the Great Barrier Reef Marine Park
Engage with an energetic and professional crew
Enjoy freshly prepared meals including an Aussie BBQ
locations: Airlie Beach,Great Barrier Reef,Hill Inlet,Whitehaven,Whitsunday Island
itinerary:
**Day 1:**
- Depart for Whitehaven Beach
- Bush walk to Hill Inlet Lookout
- Snorkeling at pristine reef locations
- Enjoy an Aussie BBQ dinner onboard
**Day 2:**
- Continue exploring the Whitsunday Islands
- Snorkel at additional reef locations
- Return to Coral Sea Marina
menu:
**Day 1 Menu:**
- Aussie BBQ featuring tender steaks, giant sausages, crispy salads, and bread rolls
**Day 2 Menu:**
- Cold meat platters, coleslaw, potato, Indian rice, and egg salads
**Breakfast:**
- Fresh fruit salad, cereals, toast, and jams
**Snacks:**
- Pre-dinner chips and dips, pastries, bruschetta, chocolate cake, and donuts
ideal_for: Adventure seekers, nature lovers, and those looking to experience the Whitsundays in a fun and engaging way
whats_extra: ['Chilled bottled water and soft drinks $2.50 each (cash only onboard)']

name: Big Fury Whitsundays Day Tour
description: Experience the Whitsundays aboard Big Fury, a dynamic and open-air sports boat offering an adventurous day tour. Perfect for singles, couples, families, and friends who seek a thrilling exploration of the Great Barrier Reef's stunning islands. Enjoy snorkeling, scenic walks, and a delicious buffet lunch on the famous Whitehaven Beach. With its shallow draft, Big Fury provides an intimate and close-up view of the islands, ensuring a memorable and unique experience.
includes:
Delicious fresh buffet lunch served on Whitehaven Beach
Afternoon cakes
Snorkeling equipment including masks, fins, snorkels, stinger suits, floatation devices, and coral viewer
Courtesy bus for accommodation transfers
highlights:
Visit the top 3 island destinations â€“ Whitehaven Beach, Hill Inlet Lookout, and a snorkeling spot on the Great Barrier Reef
2-2.5 hours at the southern end of Whitehaven Beach
Short walk to Hill Inlet Lookout for stunning views
Snorkel at island fringing reefs with equipment and tuition provided
Entertaining and informative commentary by the Big Fury crew
See turtles, birds, fish-life, and possibly humpback whales (July-September)
Maximum of 35 guests for a more private cruise experience
locations: Great Barrier Reef,Hamilton Island,Hill Inlet,Whitehaven,Whitsunday Island
menu:
**Menu:**
- Fresh salads including potato salad, macaroni pasta salad, Indian curried rice salad, and vegetable salad
- Cold meat platter with ham, roast beef, silverside, chicken, and pork
- Fresh prawns and locally produced fruit platter
- Fresh bread rolls and wraps
- Afternoon cakes and biscuits
ideal_for: Singles, couples, family groups, and friends looking for a fun and adventurous day in the Whitsundays.
important_information: ['Tour is suitable for most age groups (from 3 years and upwards to those young at heart!)']
whats_extra: ['Chilled bottled water and soft drinks $2.50 each (cash only onboard)', 'Special dietary requirements such as vegan and gluten-free can be catered for with at least 24 hours advance notice.']
